Luhut Minta Go-Jek Perhatikan Kesejahteraan Mitra Pengemudi
02 Nov 2019, 12:07 by Eko Wahyudi, Rr. Ariyani Yakti Widyastuti
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Menteri Koordinator Bidang Kemaritiman dan Investasi Luhut Binsar Pandjaitan yang hadir pada syukuran mengucapkan selamat kepada Go-Jek yang terus berkembang pada usianya kesembilan tahun. Dalam kesempatan itu, Luhut meminta Go-Jek untuk terus memberikan dampak yang luas dengan selalu menjaga kesejahteraan para mitra pengemudinya.
"Kepada manajemen yang Gojek agar tetap memperhatikan driver-driver-nya. Saya titip juga supaya driver-driver-nya tetap bekerja keras, disiplin, dan mentaati aturan aturan. Karena kita menghidupi keluarga, kita harus disiplin," kata Luhut di hadapan ribuan mitra Go-Jek, di wilayah Gelora Bung Karno, Jakarta, Sabtu, 2 November 2019.
Luhut berharap bahwa Go-Jek akan terus berkembang menjadi lebih besar dan berperan dalam kemajuan Indonesia. "Go-Jek ini terus berkembang. Ini perusahaan anak Indonesia, berkembang di Indonesia. Kita harus jadi tuan di dalam negeri. Jaketmu ini sudah di mana-mana, sudah dikenal ada di lima negara," ujarnya.
Tak hanya itu, Luhut juga berpesan kepada para mitra pengemudi untuk selalu menjaga lingkungan dan membuang sampah plastik sesuai tempatnya. Selain itu, juga mengingatkan penumpang Go-Jek untuk ikut tidak membuang sampah plastik sembarangan karena dampaknya yang buruk bagi lingkungan.
Menutup sambutannya, Menko Luhut berpesan agar Go-Jek dan para mitranya terus berkembang dan memajukan ekonomi Indonesia melalui program-program yang dimiliki. Apalagi dengan kapasitas yang semakin besar, ada tanggung jawab yang lebih besar, dan ada dampak yang lebih besar yang dapat diberikan.
"Mari kita buat Go-Jek tambah hebat lagi. Ke depan Pemerintah akan tetap mendukung Go-Jek karena mengayomi rakyat kecil," kata Luhut.
Saat ini Go-Jek telah menjadi decacorn di Indonesia, yang memiliki valuasi di atas US$ 10 miliar. Selain itu, Go-Jek berkontribusi dalam digitalisasi ekonomi Indonesia. Go-Jek juga berperan dalam mempertemukan mitra Go-Jek dengan para konsumen. Sehingga, kedua pihak terbantu oleh jasa yang disediakan Go-Jek.

Luhut Asks Go-Jek to Pay Attention to Driver Welfare
02 Nov 2019, 12:07 by Eko Wahyudi, Rr. Ariyani Yakti Widyastuti
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Coordinating Minister for Maritime Affairs and Investment Luhut Binsar Pandjaitan who was present at the thanksgiving congratulated Go-Jek, who continued to develop at the ninth year of age. On that occasion, Luhut asked Go-Jek to continue to make a broad impact by always maintaining the welfare of its driving partners.
"To the management of Gojek to keep paying attention to the drivers. I also entrust the drivers to work hard, be disciplined, and obey the rules. Because we support our families, we must be disciplined," Luhut said before thousands of partners. Go-Jek, in the Gelora Bung Karno region, Jakarta, Saturday, November 2, 2019.
Luhut hopes that Go-Jek will continue to grow to be bigger and play a role in Indonesia's progress. "Go-Jek continues to grow. This is an Indonesian subsidiary company, developing in Indonesia. We must become masters in the country. This jacket is everywhere, already known in five countries," he said.
Not only that, Luhut also advised the driver's partners to always protect the environment and dispose of plastic waste according to its place. In addition, it also reminded Go-Jek passengers not to litter plastic because they had a bad impact on the environment.
Closing his remarks, Coordinating Minister Luhut advised that Go-Jek and its partners continue to develop and advance the Indonesian economy through its programs. Especially with greater capacity, there are greater responsibilities, and there is a greater impact that can be given.
"Let's make Go-Jek even more powerful. In the future the Government will continue to support Go-Jek because it protects the small people," Luhut said.
Currently Go-Jek has become a decacorn in Indonesia, which has a valuation of above US $ 10 billion. In addition, Go-Jek contributes to the digitalization of the Indonesian economy. Go-Jek also plays a role in bringing together Go-Jek partners with consumers. Thus, both parties were helped by the services provided by Go-Jek.
